program4

Class Conversions

  • java.lang.Object
    • program4.Conversions

  • public class Conversions
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides methods for converting Java's primitive data types into byte arrays.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Conversions() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static char byteArray2Char(byte[] b)
      Converts a byte array back to a char primitive type
      static double byteArray2Double(byte[] b)
      Converts a byte array back to a double primitive type
      static float byteArray2Float(byte[] b)
      Converts a byte array back to a float primitive type
      static int byteArray2Int(byte[] b)
      Converts a byte array back to an int primitive type
      static long byteArray2Long(byte[] b)
      Converts a byte array back to a long primitive type
      static java.lang.Short byteArray2Short(byte[] b)
      Converts a byte array back to a short primitive type
      static byte[] char2ByteArray(char value)
      Converts a char to a byte array
      static byte[] double2ByteArray(double value)
      Convert double into a byte array.
      static byte[] float2ByteArray(float value)
      Convert float into a byte array.
      static byte[] int2ByteArray(int value)
      Convert int into a byte array.
      static byte[] long2ByteArray(long value)
      Convert long into a byte array.
      static byte[] short2ByteArray(short value)
      Convert short into a byte array.
